Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.tensorics.core.tensor.Context
    context of a tensor will be directly a position
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.tensorics.core.math.ExtendedField.cheating()
    Will be removed, as soon as a unit-treatment framework, purely based on fields is in place.
    org.tensorics.core.math.impl.ExtendedFieldImpl.cheating()
    because it shall be removed as soon as a better way to handle units (based on field elements) is provided
    org.tensorics.core.lang.Tensorics.convertToQuantified(Tensor<S>, Unit)
    use renamed method Tensorics.quantityTensorOf(Tensor, Unit)
    org.tensorics.core.fields.doubles.DoubleCheating.fromDouble(double)
    the whole class should not be necessary in the future, if the unit-conversions are based fully on field operations.
    org.tensorics.core.tensor.ImmutableTensor.fromMap(Map<Position, T>)
    use fromMap(Set> dimensions, Map map)
    org.tensorics.core.tensor.Position.getCoordinates()
    use coordinates() instead
    org.tensorics.core.tensor.Context.getPosition()
    Context class will be removed, instead position should be used everyhwere
    org.tensorics.core.tensor.Coordinates.mapOf(Iterable<? extends C>) 
    org.tensorics.core.tensorbacked.Tensorbackeds.mergeTo(Iterable<TB>, Class<TBOUT>)
    use construct(classToReturn).byMergingTb(toBeMerged);
    org.tensorics.core.tensor.Shape.of(Iterable<Position>)
    Using this method to construct a shape guesses the dimensionality from the passed positions.
    org.tensorics.core.tensor.Context.of(Object...)
    use position directly
    org.tensorics.core.tensor.Shape.of(Position...)
    Using this method to construct a shape guesses the dimensionality from the passed positions.
    org.tensorics.core.tensor.Context.of(Position)
    use position directly
    org.tensorics.core.tensor.Context.of(Set<?>)
    use position directly
    org.tensorics.core.tensor.TensorBuilder.setTensorContext(Position)
    use TensorBuilder.context(Position)
    org.tensorics.core.fields.doubles.DoubleCheating.toDouble(Double)
    the whole class should not be necessary in the future, if the unit-conversions are based fully on field operations.
    org.tensorics.core.tensorbacked.TensorbackedBuilder.withContext(Object...)
    use TensorbackedBuilder.context(Object...)
    org.tensorics.core.tensorbacked.TensorbackedBuilder.withContext(Position)
    use TensorbackedBuilder.context(Position)
